ProductInfo.Features:
Package List: 1). 4 Channel H.264 DVR (no hard drive included); 4). Sony CCD 650 TV Lines Waterproof Cameras ; 4). 60ft Video Power Combined Cables ; 1) Power Adapter Unit
DVR adopts the standard Main profile H.264 compression technology, supports CIF/D1 recording, Network transmission, and playback simultaneously
Mobile phone surveillance (Win CE/Symbian/iPhone/Blackberry/Android)
Pre-made 60ft Video Power Combined Cables makes installing easy.
1/3'' Sony CCD Cameras provides 650 TV Lines very High resolution image.
ProductInfo.Name: CCTV Security Surveillance 4 High Resolution Day Night Waterproof IR Cameras 4 Channel H.264 Network DVR Complete System
